short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thoughtcrime is a fun and simple extension that highlights a websites that may be exposing you to propaganda.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Thoughtcrime uses fun, red, comic sans replacements for words and phrases commonly used in articles that try to control how you think.
